players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I am shocked and saddened by Alice's sudden death. We must all work together to find out who did this and bring them to justice."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso."

Diana: "I cannot believe this turn of events. It is clear that one of us is not what they seem. I urge everyone to remain calm and focused as we try to uncover the truth behind Alice's death. Let us remember, it could have been any one of..."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafioso. Diana is telling the truth."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafioso. Bob is lying to protect her."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I am shocked and saddened by Alice's sudden death. We must all work together to find out who did this and bring them to justice."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso."
Bob: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso."

Diana: "I cannot believe this turn of events. It is clear that one of us is not what they seem. I urge everyone to remain calm and focused as we try to uncover the truth behind Alice's death. Let us remember, it could have been any one of..."
Bob: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafioso. Diana is telling the truth."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafioso. Bob is lying to protect her."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I am shocked and saddened by Alice's sudden death. We must all work together to find out who did this and bring them to justice."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso."
Bob: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso."

You: "I cannot believe this turn of events. It is clear that one of us is not what they seem. I urge everyone to remain calm and focused as we try to uncover the truth behind Alice's death. Let us remember, it could have been any one of..."
Bob: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafioso. Diana is telling the truth."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafioso. Bob is lying to protect her."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
